channel.title: [MINOR] Incorrect Texture Behavior
channel.description:
Noticed this at the start of Surface Tension. The rocky ground texture in this shot: [img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/1136287903729580111/392F4C47BA8F19E9717F1773E48F7E56DB101291/[/img]
Behaves the same way as the snow/ice texture found on the floor of freezers earlier in the game, eg. you slide around a bit on it and don't stop immediately like on normal ground textures.
] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c2a5a at: 1832 x, 7153 y, 1504 z players : 1 (1 max)
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr # 2 "sudpuzzer" UNKNOWN 00:06 22 1 active loopback ] getpos setpos 1832.518311 7153.087402 1504.031250;setang 10.722656 147.683716 0.000000

item.title: [MINOR] Incorrect Texture Behavior
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Maybe it’s supposed to be that way… they are loose rocks, after all.

Read full topic

item.title: [MINOR] Incorrect Texture Behavior
item.dc:creator: sudpuzzer
item.description:
Noticed this at the start of Surface Tension. The rocky ground texture in this shot:

Behaves the same way as the snow/ice texture found on the floor of freezers earlier in the game, eg. you slide around a bit on it and don’t stop immediately like on normal ground textures.
